snippet: Senate Democrats elevated one of their most battle-tested members, Michael Bennet of Colorado, to head the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee as the party gears up for what is expected to be a tough cycle in 2014.
abstract: Senate Democrats elevated one of their most battle-tested members, Michael Bennet of Colorado, to head the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee as the party gears up for what is expected to be a tough cycle in 2014.

headline.main: Bennet Chosen to Lead Democratic Senate Campaign Committee
